remarks: Convert an operation distributive law to class notation.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)
statement:
caovdig.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. K /\ y e. S /\ z e. S ) ) -> ( x G ( y F z ) ) = ( ( x G y ) H ( x G z ) ) ) $.
caovdig $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. S /\ C e. S ) ) -> ( A G ( B F C ) ) = ( ( A G B ) H ( A G C ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d G x y z $.
$d H x y z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
